page.title: 20GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: We divided childrens' games into sections:{skipping,running,jumping, {board-games,party,ball}and{card games. We counted 130 games and 59 of them were described.Most of the activities were indoors because of the wide selection of board and electronic games children could choose from. { { OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES:} In the winter we play{football, {netball}and{running games}to keep warm.In the summer time we have much more variety:{rounders,cricket,}and other ball games,{athletics}and{ {skipping}:our favourite skipping game is 'beat'. Other favourite games are{'tag', {'two-balls','monopoly','frogger', {'murder-in-the-dark'}and{'dodgeball'. Pages 18-20 by St Joseph's R.C.Primary School.
